pr_title: [HUDI-1419] Add base implement for hudi java client

timeline.bodyText: how about returning an Option.empty() instead
timeline.author: wangxianghu

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to make java-client independent of scala ?
timeline.author: wangxianghu

replies.bodyText: Yes, it should not depend on scala.
replies.author: shenh062326
shenh062326

replies.bodyText: Maybe we should alter the return of SerializablePairFunction.call from Tuple2 to org.apache.hudi.common.util.collection.Pair. What do you think?
replies.author: shenh062326

replies.bodyText:
Maybe we should alter the return of SerializablePairFunction.call from Tuple2 to org.apache.hudi.common.util.collection.Pair. What do you think?

I agree with you.
you can give it a try.
